scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://ideo-sso/1.1/ --profile ideo-sso --cache-control max-age=3600 --exclude '*.html' --exclude '*.map' --exclude '.DS_Store' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3P1EIEE9327TY --invalidation-batch "Paths={Quantity=1,Items=[/*]},CallerReference=$(date +%s)" --profile ideo-sso
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist s3://ideo-sso-staging/1.1/ --profile ideo-sso --cache-control max-age=3600 --exclude '*.html' --exclude '*.map' --exclude '.DS_Store' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3ICOAG9OCZWDX --invalidation-batch "Paths={Quantity=1,Items=[/*]},CallerReference=$(date +%s)" --profile ideo-sso
